title: Position/Size Persistence Logging
details:
Quick Tab position/size updates flow through two paths:

**Content Script Path (local updates):**
1. DragController/ResizeHandle → window.js callbacks (onPositionChangeEnd, onSizeChangeEnd)
2. → UpdateHandler.handlePositionChangeEnd() / handleSizeChangeEnd()
3. → _persistToStorage() → _doPersist()
4. → storage-utils.js persistStateToStorage()
5. → browser.storage.local.set()

**Background Script Path (message-based):**
1. browser.runtime.sendMessage() with UPDATE_QUICK_TAB_POSITION_FINAL / UPDATE_QUICK_TAB_SIZE_FINAL
2. → background.js messageRouter
3. → QuickTabHandler.handlePositionUpdate() / handleSizeUpdate()
4. → updateQuickTabProperty()
5. → saveStateToStorage()
6. → browser.storage.local.set()

Both paths have comprehensive logging added in v1.6.4 for debugging persistence issues.
